actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Gila River system in the State of New Mexico as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, to provide for the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over certain Federal land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
short_title: M.H. Dutch Salmon Greater Gila Wild and Scenic River Act

titles.title: M.H. Dutch Salmon Greater Gila Wild and Scenic River Act
M.H. Dutch Salmon Greater Gila Wild and Scenic River Act

A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Gila River system in the State of New Mexico as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, to provide for the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over certain Federal land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
